reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 413/08: OFFICIAL COPY OF LAW FROM E-LAWS WEBSITE
reg_info.reg_name_text: Official copy of law from e-laws website
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 413/08: OFFICIAL COPY OF LAW FROM E-LAWS WEBSITE

content.content: 1. The following formats are prescribed for the purposes of clause 35 (1) (b) of the Act: 1. HTML format. 2. PDF. 3. Microsoft Word format. O. Reg. 53/14, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The following formats are prescribed for the purposes of clause 35 (1) (b) of the Act:

1. HTML format.

2. PDF.

3. Microsoft Word format. O. Reg. 53/14, s. 1.

content.content: 2. For greater certainty, the following are not made part of the official law by virtue of section 1: 1. Text referred to in section 70 of the Act. 2. Text provided in a copy of a law as an alternative to non-text content in that law. O. Reg. 53/14, s. 1.  Français
content.raw_html:
2. For greater certainty, the following are not made part of the official law by virtue of section 1:

1. Text referred to in section 70 of the Act.

2. Text provided in a copy of a law as an alternative to non-text content in that law. O. Reg. 53/14, s. 1.

 

Français
